text: Dojčin Perazić (17 December 1945 – 25 January 2022) was a Montenegrin footballer. He played as a midfielder. Perazić was born in Cetinje, SR Montenegro, FPR Yugoslavia. His career began in 1965 and he retired in 1978. He played for FK Lovćen, Red Star Belgrade, NK Maribor, FK Vojvodina and ADO Den Haag. Perazić died in Cetinje on 25 January 2022 at the age of 76. ==Referneces== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Montenegrin footballers
title: Dojčin Perazić
